Name: Phantom
Notes: Most popular Solana wallet, MetaMask of Solana

Name: Solflare
Notes: First dedicated Solana wallet, powerful features with developer support

Name: Exodus
Platforms: iOS; Android; Desktop; Web, MacOs, Brave, Linux

Name: Glow
Notes: Optimized for Apple users, strong NFT support

Name: Trust Wallet
Description: Trust Wallet is a multi-chain self-custody crypto wallet and secure gateway to thousands of Web3 decentralized applications (dApps).

Name: MathWallet
Notes: Wide blockchain support, cloud wallet solution

Name: TokenPocket
Notes: Multi-chain, large user base, hardware wallet support

Name: Sollet
Notes: Developer-focused, basic features, many migrated to Phantom

Name: Fuse Wallet
Notes: Safe wallet with 2FA, recovery options, no seed phrase required

Name: Decaf
Notes: Global on-chain bank for instant money transfers

Name: Circle Programmable Wallets
Notes: Built for developers to create in-app wallets

Name: Dynamic
Notes: Tools for effortless login, wallet creation, user management

Name: WalletConnect
Notes: Developer tools for digital ownership user experiences

Name: Helium Wallet
Notes: Trusted way to manage Helium accounts

Name: Espresso Cash
Notes: Specific to Solana Mobile and dApps

Name: Ledger Nano S
Notes: Entry-level hardware wallet, integrates with Phantom/Solflare

Name: Ledger Flex
Notes: Latest Ledger model with advanced features

Name: Trezor Model One
Notes: Original Trezor model, basic but secure

Name: Tangem Wallet
Notes: NFC-enabled smart cards, tap and go
